reviewText: Don't be fooled. This is not a movie. It is one of those pyramid scheme companies telling you why pyramid schemes are great. There is not one even remotely intelligent statement made in this movie. I normally never write reviews. The fact they disguised this as an educational movie bothered me so much I just didn't want anyone else to waste their time or money making the same mistake I did.

An infomercial for legal pyramid schemes like amway.  I don't have anything against "network marketing" as they call it, but I can't believe I had to buy it to find out what this video was actually about. I thought it would be a documentary about marketing. Instead it was propaganda shot with a home video camera.
This DVD is poorly produced and in my Opinion is a BIG WASTE OF MONEY!!!!
I don't know what to say, this movie just shows a lot about network marketing. Very informational. The quality is fair.
I am thrilled with Forward. It reinforces my pride in the amazing Direct Sales industry. Its a must see and share for all leaders and entrepreneurs.
